title: Authors and Citation

title: Authors and Citation
text: Brüggemann S (2022). swissevote: Provides Functions Around Swiss E-Voting Trial Data Collected Centre Democracy Studies Aarau (ZDA). R package version 0.0.9011, https://gitlab.com/zdaarau/rpkgs/swissevote.
code: @Manual{,   title = {swissevote: Provides Functions Around the Swiss E-Voting Trial Data Collected by the Centre for Democracy Studies Aarau (ZDA)},   author = {Salim Brüggemann},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.9011},   url = {https://gitlab.com/zdaarau/rpkgs/swissevote}, }

what: Provides Functions Around the Swiss E-Voting Trial Data Collected by the Centre for Democracy Studies Aarau (ZDA)
title: Provides Functions Around the Swiss E-Voting Trial Data Collected by the Centre for Democracy Studies Aarau (ZDA)
text: swissevote can parse cantonal voting register data, scrape authority websites ballot data provides auxiliary functions around Swiss e-voting trial data collected Centre Democracy Studies Aarau (ZDA) University Zurich, Switzerland.

title: Provides Functions Around the Swiss E-Voting Trial Data Collected by the Centre for Democracy Studies Aarau (ZDA)
text: cantonal raw data files included package due legal restrictions /concerns regarding voter privacy thus provided user. path folder holding files must set R option swissevote.path_raw_data files path expected organized named following way: Genevan raw data files must named according column filename swissevote:::metadata_geneva_raw_datasets (defined Geneva State Chancellery). Raw data files cantons must named canton abbreviation ballot date (e.g. NE_2019-02-10).

title: Provides Functions Around the Swiss E-Voting Trial Data Collected by the Centre for Democracy Studies Aarau (ZDA)
text: Time-consuming operations like reading raw datasets scraping ballot dates cantonal websites cached local filesystem default (using pkgpins). maximum cache lifespan affected functions can set global option swissevote.global_cache_lifespan1 (defaults 30 days unset).

title: Provides Functions Around the Swiss E-Voting Trial Data Collected by the Centre for Democracy Studies Aarau (ZDA)

title: Provides Functions Around the Swiss E-Voting Trial Data Collected by the Centre for Democracy Studies Aarau (ZDA)
text: package’s source code written R Markdown file format facilitate practices commonly referred literate programming. allows actual code freely mixed explanatory supplementary information expressive Markdown format instead rely # comments . .gen.R suffixed R source code found R/ generated respective R Markdown counterparts Rmd/ using pkgpurl::purl_rmd()2. Always make changes .Rmd files – never .R files – run pkgpurl::purl_rmd() regenerate R source files.

title: Provides Functions Around the Swiss E-Voting Trial Data Collected by the Centre for Democracy Studies Aarau (ZDA)
text: package borrows lot Tidyverse design philosophies. R code adheres principles specified Tidyverse Design Guide wherever possible formatted according Tidyverse Style Guide (TSG) following exceptions: Line width limited 160 characters, double limit proposed TSG (80 characters ridiculously little given today’s high-resolution wide screen monitors). Usage magrittr’s compound assignment pipe-operator %<>% desirable3. Usage R’s right-hand assignment operator -> allowed4. R source code split several files suggested TSG instead (far possible) kept single file Rmd/swissevote.Rmd well-structured thanks Markdown support. far possible, deviations TSG plus additional restrictions formally specified lintr configuration file .lintr, lintr can used right away check formatting issues:

title: Get cantonal ballot dates — ballot_dates_cantonal
text: Get cantonal ballot dates

title: Get cantonal ballot dates — ballot_dates_cantonal
code: ballot_dates_cantonal(   cantons = c("Geneva", "Neuchatel", "Zurich"),   exclude_counterproposals = TRUE,   use_cache = TRUE,   cache_lifespan = "1 day" )

title: Get cantonal ballot dates — ballot_dates_cantonal
text: cantons names cantons retrieve ballot dates . character vector. exclude_counterproposals Exclude indirect counterproposals tie-breaker questions. logical scalar. use_cache Return cached results possible. FALSE, results always newly fetched regardless cache_lifespan. cache_lifespan duration cached results refreshed (.e. newly fetched). valid lubridate duration. relevant use_cache = TRUE.

title: Get cantonal ballot dates — ballot_dates_cantonal
text: pkgsnippets::return_label("data")

title: Get federal ballot dates — ballot_dates_federal
text: Get federal ballot dates

title: Get federal ballot dates — ballot_dates_federal
code: ballot_dates_federal(   source = c("Neuchatel", "Zurich"),   exclude_counterproposals = TRUE,   use_cache = TRUE,   cache_lifespan = "1 day" )

title: Get federal ballot dates — ballot_dates_federal
text: source Federal ballot dates can either retrieved official website canton Neuchatel (default) Zurich. Note referendum dates returned source = "Zurich", election dates can scraped source = "Neuchatel". hand, source = "Zurich" return referendum dates back 19th century, source = "Neuchatel" goes back turn millennium. exclude_counterproposals Exclude indirect counterproposals tie-breaker questions. logical scalar. use_cache Return cached results possible. FALSE, results always newly fetched regardless cache_lifespan. cache_lifespan duration cached results refreshed (.e. newly fetched). valid lubridate duration. relevant use_cache = TRUE.

text: pkgsnippets::return_label("data")

what: Retroactively merge municipalities that have merged — merge_municipalities
title: Retroactively merge municipalities that have merged — merge_municipalities
text: function builds upon swissmuni::mutations() find municipalities data merged another municipality synthetically applies merger "back time" best possible. allows subsequent data analysis better track/compare development e-voting usage time.

what: Read in raw data files of a specific Swiss canton — read_raw_data
title: Read in raw data files of a specific Swiss canton — read_raw_data
text: Read raw data files specific Swiss canton

title: Read in raw data files of a specific Swiss canton — read_raw_data
code: read_raw_data(   canton = c("Bern", "Geneva", "Neuchatel"),   ballot_date,   specific_datasets = NULL,   use_cache = TRUE,   cache_lifespan = "7 days" )

title: Read in raw data files of a specific Swiss canton — read_raw_data
text: canton canton read raw data files. ballot_date ballot date read raw data files. specific_datasets NULL, specified filenames processed. list ballot dates keys character vectors specific filenames (without filetype extension) values. Setting specific_datasets sensible case canton = "Geneva" thus ignored otherwise. use_cache Return cached results possible. FALSE, results always newly fetched regardless cache_lifespan. cache_lifespan duration cached results refreshed (.e. newly fetched). valid lubridate duration. relevant use_cache = TRUE.

title: Read in raw data files of a specific Swiss canton — read_raw_data
text: case canton = "Geneva", list tibble raw data file plus metadata tibble. Otherwise single tibble.

what: Read in raw data files from the canton of Geneva — read_raw_data_geneva
title: Read in raw data files from the canton of Geneva — read_raw_data_geneva
text: Read raw data files canton Geneva

title: Read in raw data files from the canton of Geneva — read_raw_data_geneva
code: read_raw_data_geneva(   ballot_date,   specific_datasets = NULL,   check_municipalities = TRUE,   remove_duplicated_votes = TRUE,   remove_unknown_municipality_district_combos = FALSE,   remove_NA_locality_codes = FALSE,   skip_problematic_dates = FALSE )

title: Read in raw data files from the canton of Geneva — read_raw_data_geneva
text: ballot_date ballot date read raw data files. specific_datasets NULL, specified filenames processed. list ballot dates keys character vectors specific filenames (without filetype extension) values. check_municipalities Check municipality determined entries excluding Swiss living abroad. logical scalar. remove_duplicated_votes Remove duplicate votes (votcorr == "" | votdup == "1"; necessary variable exists). logical scalar. variable votcorr used identify voters several voting cards issued (due non-receipt, loss, etc.). dummy variable votdup serves exact purpose. cases votcorr = "" (votdup = "1") filtered order get correct results. (rare) case variables included contradict , votdup given preference. remove_unknown_municipality_district_combos Ignore rows raw data Swiss abroad missing municipality (usually undocumented district code 99). logical scalar. remove_NA_locality_codes Ignore rows raw data municipality_code_2_digits set (NA). logical scalar. skip_problematic_dates Skip ballot_dates unresolved parsing problems exist. logical scalar.

title: Read in raw data files from the canton of Geneva — read_raw_data_geneva
text: list tibble raw data file plus metadata tibble.
